name: 🌌 World Creation
description: The gods shape Masthothal as a divine testing ground, beginning the cosmic cycle.

name: 🌍 The Primordial Era
description: Gods experiment with creation, shaping landscapes and life. Mortals appear as unintended results, surviving the chaotic divine playground.

name: 🏛️ The Age of Foundations
description: Civilizations rise and fall, guided or opposed by gods. Mortals master magic and begin shaping their fate.

name: ⚔️ The Great Rebellion
description: A major uprising shakes divine order as mortals fight back against godly oppression and ancient empires fracture.

name: ⛓️ Kharath-Duum
description: A legendary conflict or calamity that shifted the balance of power permanently. Details are shrouded in myth.

name: 🔥 The Great War of Avernus & Celestara
description: Heaven and Hell collide. Divine realms scar the material plane in a 50-year-long celestial conflict.

name: 🕳️ The Epoch of Malzarek
description: A short, devastating era marked by the rule of the Void Tyrant—Malzarek's corruption spreads through reality itself.

name: 🛡️ The Age of Warding
description: Barriers are erected across planes and realms. Magic is constrained, divine access is sealed, and reality stabilizes.

name: 🌒 Age of Shadows Reborn
description: The void tyrant Malzarek returned from his entombment.

name: 💀 Death of Vyras Sangrelis
description: The demise of the immortal blood seer marks a turning point in prophecy and balance.
